product_name: Arm & Hammer Dog Waste Bags on a Roll - 72 Bags - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stock up! You'll want 72 Arm & Hammer Dog Waste Bags on a Roll so you never run out. Biodegradable corn-based bags feature Arm & Hammer baking soda for natural odor control. Works best with the Essentials Waste Bag Dispenser, not included. Closeout.
short_description: Stock up! You'll want 72 Arm & Hammer Dog Waste Bags on a Roll so you never run out.
